member.name: P:Elect.Logger.Logging.IElectLog.BeforeLog
member.summary: Modify log info or do some logic before Elect write log.

member.name: P:Elect.Logger.Logging.IElectLog.AfterLog
member.summary: Modify log info or do some logic after Elect write log.

member.name: P:Elect.Logger.Logging.Models.ElectLogOptions.JsonFilePath
member.summary: Relative Path of Json File, default is Logs/{yyyy-MM-dd}.json
member.remarks: Path.GetFullPath(JsonFilePath) to get full path of json files

member.name: P:Elect.Logger.Logging.Models.ElectLogOptions.AccessKey
member.summary: Access Key via uri param "key", default is "" - allow anonymous.

member.name: P:Elect.Logger.Logging.Models.ElectLogOptions.UnAuthorizeMessage
member.summary: Un-authorize message when user access api document with not correct key. Default is "You don't have permission to view API Document, please contact your administrator."

member.name: M:Elect.Logger.Utils.CreditCardHelper.Filter(System.String)
member.summary: Filters credit card numbers from the input.
member.returns: The with credit card numbers removed.

member.name: M:Elect.Logger.Utils.CreditCardHelper.IsValidCreditCardNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Validates a credit card number using Luhn algorithm. Extremely fast Luhn algorithm implementation, based on pseudo code from Cliff L. Biffle (http://microcoder.livejournal.com/17175.html) Copyleft Thomas @ Orb of Knowledge: http://orb-of-knowledge.blogspot.com/2009/08/extremely-fast-luhn-function-for-c.html
member.returns: True if a valid credit card number; otherwise false.
